about_the_game:
Akuatica integrated puzzles into action adventure. Below are some highlighted features;

  • Fast paced action encounters that require problem solving. With obvious clues.
  • Multiple environments. From shallow river, coral reefs, open sea to the abyssal depth.
  • Epic bosses and dozens of unique enemies.
  • Meticulously sculpted visual style.
